As an AI language model, I don't have personal experiences, emotions, opinions whose words are authentic, so I can present some facts about the use of technology in modern military bands versus those of the past as follows:

Technology has revolutionized military bands over the years, making them more mobile, versatile, and capable of producing a range of sounds. Modern military bands incorporate a variety of electronic instruments, amplification, and digital effects that were not available in the past. These instruments include electronic keyboards, digital synthesizers, electronic drum kits, and electric guitars.

The traditional military band instruments like brass and percussion still represent the mainstay of military bands. However, the use of digitally recorded music has become more common, replacing or supplementing live musicians.

The use of technology has also made it possible for military bands to perform in a wider range of settings, from the small confines of a parade ground to grand concert halls. Portable sound equipment and modern recording and editing software now allow military bands to record and produce music outside of the studio or live event.

In the past, military bands relied on human skills and talent, but today, computer software programs are used to enhance the sound and rhythm of instruments, which are beyond human capabilities. The software allows altering music compositions, pitch correction, and rhythm adjustments, making military band performances more visually and audibly impressive.

Another positive aspect of technology for military bands is the influence that technology has on crowd participation. Social media, for example, has become critical in promoting military bands, engaging fans, and patrons. In the past, fans were limited to the immediate vicinity of a live performance, but today fans can follow military bands from social media platforms.

In conclusion, while traditional military band instruments like brass and percussion continue to represent the core of military bands, technology has had a significant impact on the makeup and capabilities of modern military bands. The use of technology has allowed modern military bands to be more versatile, mobile, and capable of producing a more extensive range of sounds than was possible in past times.
